body_html:
They have similar memory usage in general, although there are some special cases where it may differ substantially. You can see track down memory usage by looking at memory allocator statistics you get when running with FULL_TRACING options (see #1824 (comment)
)
body_text:
They have similar memory usage in general, although there are some special cases where it may differ substantially. You can see track down memory usage by looking at memory allocator statistics you get when running with FULL_TRACING options (see #1824 (comment)
)
body:
They have similar memory usage in general, although there are some special cases where it may differ substantially. You can see track down memory usage by looking at memory allocator statistics you get when running with FULL_TRACING options (see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/1824#issuecomment-225754659
)
